name: DudeQuest
description:
Dude Quest is a 2D puzzle game made in 2 weeks for the #RainbowJam16 gamejam.
You push around blocks / dudes onto buttons to unlock doors and free other dudes.

there is still quite a bit we want to add into the game, so we'll probably be working on it even after the jam is over.

art / level design - @nerdybirb

programming / music - @Ltven0mi
